AboutSection.title: About SFMA
AboutSection.description: The Saudi Facilities Management Association (SFMA) is a non-profit organization established on 1441/11/9 AH, corresponding to 2020/6/30 AD, under the supervision of the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development. It aims to promote the concept of facilities management as a key partner in achieving the Kingdom’s Vision 2030, through a comprehensive strategic plan that seeks to achieve inclusive and sustainable development, through effective partnerships between the public and private sectors and the third sector, to support national development in all aspects of facilities management and its diverse services.
AboutSection.QouteSection: "Success stories always begin with a vision, and the most successful visions are those built on the strength of a vibrant society, a thriving economy, and an ambitious nation."

AboutSection.title: About SFMA
AboutSection.description: The Saudi Facilities Management Association was established as part of the advancement towards a prosperous future for Saudi Arabia, in line with its ambitious vision to enhance its national presence and align with Vision 2030. SFMA initiated a comprehensive strategic plan for the coming years to achieve integrated and direct development in all aspects of facilities management and services. Our aim is to be a professional association that seeks to develop and enhance the profession and those working in it. Its roles include setting standards and practice guidelines, licensing requirements, establishing rules and exams for obtaining professional certificates, conducting studies and research, organizing training courses, holding professional seminars and conferences, and offering consultancy services in its field, according to the council and member-set regulations. Ultimately, we aim to be the hub for all facility management professionals.

MotivatorsSection.title: Motivators
MotivatorsSection.description: Towards a prosperous future, driven by innovation, sustainability, and security

OurVisionSection.title: Our Vision
OurVisionSection.description: The destination for facilities management experts and success partners in Saudi Arabia
OurVisionSection.content: To be the primary reference in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia for enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of facilities management, contributing to the realization of Vision 2030 by advancing the facilities management sector and offering best global practices. This includes building a comprehensive professional community that supports innovation and sustainability, facilitates knowledge sharing and expertise exchange, and improves the quality of facilities, boosts performance, and strengthens the sector's competitiveness locally and globally.

OurGoalsSection.title: Our Goals
OurGoalsSection.description: We work to develop facilities management and enhance its efficiency to achieve sustainable development that meets future aspirations
OurGoalsSection.p_1: Knowledge and experience exchange among facilities management professionals
OurGoalsSection.p_2: Participation in national development goals in alignment with Saudi Arabia’s Vision
OurGoalsSection.p_3: Development of FM standards based on our built environment and culture
OurGoalsSection.p_4: Provision of research and studies in FM
OurGoalsSection.p_5: Professional development in FM both scientifically and technically

PillarsSection.title: SFMA Pillar System
PillarsSection.description: An integrated system that enhances the efficiency and sustainability of the association, based on best practices to achieve institutional excellence

ValuesSection.title: Our Values
ValuesSection.sub_title: We are grounded in solid principles that promote excellence and commitment, aiming to elevate the facilities management sector toward a sustainable future.

Training.sub_title: Enhance your skills with specialized training programs in facilities management according to the latest global standards

our_message.title: Our Message
our_message.subtitle: We are committed to empowering the facilities management sector through education, professional development, and strategic partnerships.
our_message.content: The Saudi Facilities Management Association (SFMA) strives to empower the facilities management sector in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia by providing a supportive environment for education and professional development, building strategic partnerships with relevant entities, and delivering high-quality services to its members, aiming to enhance the level of services provided in facilities and contribute to sustainable development.

our_tasks.title: Our Tasks
our_tasks.subtitle: The association seeks to advance the facilities management sector through skill development and enhancing professional competence.
our_tasks.content: The Saudi Facilities Management Association is a professional association aimed at developing and enhancing the level of workers in the facilities management sector. Its tasks include establishing foundations and standards for practicing the profession and developing them, including licensing conditions, setting rules and exams required for obtaining professional certificates, preparing studies and research, organizing courses, holding seminars and conferences related to the profession, as well as providing consultations. Ultimately, we will be the hub for all facilities management professionals.

our_vision.title: Our Vision
our_vision.description: The destination for facilities management experts and success partners in Saudi Arabia
our_vision.content: To be the primary reference in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia for enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of facilities management, contributing to the realization of Vision 2030 by advancing the facilities management sector and offering best global practices. This includes building a comprehensive professional community that supports innovation and sustainability, facilitates knowledge sharing and expertise exchange, and improves the quality of facilities, boosts performance, and strengthens the sector's competitiveness locally and globally.

ConsultationSection.title: Professional Consultation Service
ConsultationSection.description: The Saudi Facility Management Association offers specialized consulting services to help individuals and organizations develop effective and sustainable facility management solutions. Whether you're representing a government entity, a company, or looking to improve your work environment — our experts are ready to support you.

ConsultationAlert.title: Ready to connect with an expert?
ConsultationAlert.description: Our team of experts is ready to help you develop innovative and sustainable facility management solutions.

HowWeHelp.title: How We Help You
HowWeHelp.subtitle: Our integrated consulting approach ensures sustainable and effective solutions

1.title: Understanding Your Needs
1.description: We begin with a detailed session to understand your challenges and the goals you want to achieve in facility management.

2.title: Identifying the Right Solutions
2.description: Our expert team develops tailored solutions to meet your unique needs, aligned with global best practices.

3.title: Providing Ongoing Support
3.description: Our role doesn't end with delivering solutions — we continue to support and follow up to ensure successful implementation.

event_planning.title: Event Planning Service
event_planning.description: The Saudi Facilities Management Association has extensive experience in planning and executing all types of events, including conferences, exhibitions, workshops, and seminars. We provide comprehensive solutions to manage your event from idea to completion.
event_planning.card_1_desc: We handle all stages of the event with precision and high professionalism.
event_planning.card_2_desc: Our team manages all event stages with utmost precision and professionalism.
event_planning.card_3_desc: We adhere to global quality standards in event management.
